plugins.name: fio_cz
plugins.description: This plugin enables you to import payments from Fio bank to UCRM. See https://www.fio.cz/bankovni-sluzby/api-bankovnictvi

plugins.name: kmz-map
plugins.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend Google Map for clients to view tower coverage.

plugins.name: mkt-queue-sync
plugins.description: Very basic plugin based on a Ubiquiti plugin, to synchronize Ucrm Services with Miktotik Simple Queue https://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/Manual:Queue

plugins.name: packetlogic-packet-manager
plugins.description: UCRM Plugin that synchronizes customers with Procera Networks PacketLogic system.

plugins.name: quickbooks-online
plugins.description: This plugin exports payments and invoices to QuickBooks Online

plugins.name: routeros-packet-manager
plugins.description: This plugin allows using Mikrotik as a packet manager

plugins.name: ucrm-client-signup
plugins.description: A UCRM plugin that provides a frontend form for clients to signup.
